definition: any of various kelps especially of the genus Laminaria
details:
noun
- any of various kelps especially of the genus Laminaria
= synonyms: sea tangle
- any of various coarse seaweeds
= synonyms: sea tang
- brown algae seaweed with serrated edges
= synonyms: serrated wrack
- a common rockweed used in preparing kelp and as manure
= synonyms: bladderwrack, black rockweed, bladder fucus
- a tart spicy quality
= synonyms: nip
- the taste experience when a savoury condiment is taken into the mouth
= synonyms: nip
